Dandilion
```{r}
# Define the number of points
points  <- 9000

# Define the Golden Angle
angle <- pi * (3 - sqrt(5))

t <- (1:points) * angle
x <- sin(t)
y <-cos(t)
df <- data.frame(t, x, y)


p <- ggplot(df, aes(x*t, y*t)) + 
  geom_point(color = "white", shape = '*', alpha = 0.4, size = 10) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-11000, 40000)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-15000, 40000)) +
  theme(
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent", linetype = 0),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent"),
    legend.position = "none"
)

```

funciÃ³n
```{r}
pelusas = function(points, angle, color = "white", shape = 16, alpha = 0.5, size = 1){
t <- (1:points) * angle
x <- sin(t)
y <-cos(t)
df <- data.frame(t, x, y)

plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x*t, y*t)) + 
  geom_point(color = color, shape = shape, alpha = alpha, size = size) +
  theme(
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent", linetype = 0),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent"),
    legend.position = "none"
) 

return(plot)
  
}
```

```{r}
(p3 <- pelusas(1000, 4.20, "#a9e185", alpha = 0.3, size = 0.6))
(p4 <- pelusas(400, pi*2/21, "#f4df62", size = 0.2))
(p5 <- pelusas(2000, 21*pi^2, "#e75555", size = 2, alpha = 0.1, shape = 1))
(p6 <- pelusas(9000, 3*exp(140), "#9CCFE7", size = 0.2, alpha = 0.2, shape = 16)) 
(p7 <- pelusas(300, 0.1, "#977fd7", size = 10, alpha = 0.2, shape = 1))
```

fondo
```{r}

grid <- long_grid(x = seq(0, 1, length.out = 1000),
                  y = seq(0, 1, length.out = 1000))

grid <- grid %>% 
  mutate(
    noise = fracture(gen_perlin, fbm, octaves = 4, x = x, y = y, freq_init = 5)
  ) 


bg <- ggplot(grid, aes(x, y, fill = noise)) + geom_raster() +
  scale_fill_gradient(high = "#000f18", low = "#001f30") +
    theme(
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#000f18"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#000f18"),
    legend.position = "none"
)

```
